page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE (cont.)
page.content: Our first piece of work is revision either maths or english and should be completed before the bell goes for Assembly. The{Headmistress}takes this. We have a hymn, prayer and talk which usually lasts about 20 minutes. During the rest of the morning we complete a piece of{English work}and some{Maths.}When 12.00 noon arrives we go to the hall for our lunch and then play out until 1.00 pm. The afternoon lessons are usually connected with{geography, history, bi- {ology topics}or{library periods.}Once a week we have a games period and in the summer we{swim}in the school pool. At 3.30 p.m. school finishes and it is time to walk home. I get changed out of{school uniform}and either play on my{bicycle}or watch{T.V.}until tea time, and then I may play out or do {homework}until 9.30 when I go to bed.
